actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act

summary.text: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and Development, construction of facilities, and research and program management.

titles.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act

A bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.
